<!-- North Bit Solutions Website Project -->

# Project: North Bit Solutions Company Website

## Tech Stack

- React 18 with Vite
- Material UI (MUI) for components and styling
- Framer Motion for animations
- Frontend only (no backend/database)

## Design Guidelines

- Futuristic, clean dark theme
- Modern tech aesthetic with smooth animations
- Responsive design for all screen sizes

## Project Structure

- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/sections` - Page sections (Hero, About, Services, Contact)
- `/src/theme` - MUI theme configuration
- `/src/assets` - Static assets

## Brand

- Company Name: North Bit Solutions
- Tagline: Tomorrow's solutions for today's problems
